name: 李代數專題
description: 李代數在許多領域如微分幾何和物理上面，都有重要的角色。本課程建立在李代數的基礎下，進一步探討semisimple Lie algebras、Lie groups ，以及Lie groups 和 Lie algebras的關係。希望學生習得李代數相關進階知識，作為學生從事相關領域研究時之基礎。
goals: 李代數在許多領域如微分幾何和物理上面，都有重要的角色。本課程建立在李代數的基礎下，進一步探討semisimple Lie algebras、Lie groups ，以及Lie groups 和 Lie algebras的關係。希望學生習得李代數相關進階知識，作為學生從事相關領域研究時之基礎。
syllabus:
Root systems  
1\. Classification of root systems (2 weeks)  
2\. Construction of root systems and automorphisms (1 week)  
3\. Abstract theory of weights (1 week)  
  
Isomorphism theorems and conjugacy theorems  
4\. Isomorphism theorems (1 week)  
5\. Cartan subalgebras (1 week)  
6\. conjugacy theorems (2 weeks)  
  
Classification of finite dimensional semisimple Lie algebras  
7\. Universal enveloping algebras (2 weeks)  
8\. Generators and relations (2 weeks)  
9\. The simple algebras (1 week)  
  
Representation theory of finite dimensional semisimple Lie algebras  
10\. Weights and maximal vectors (1 week)  
11\. Finite dimensional modules (1 week)  
12\. Multiplicity formula (1 week)  
13\. Characters (1 week)  
14\. Formula of Weyl, Kostant and Steinberg (1 week)
